fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces

Interface PortFactoryI


  • public interface PortFactoryI
    The interface PortFactoryI declares a set of signatures to be implemented by a port factory.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2020-02-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
